title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Early-day communications linger in the air and influence your thoughts. Shared words and sentiments tumble through the back of your mind long after a conversation is over today. Avoid rushing a decision, especially when trying something new or taking a project in a fresh direction is under consideration. The seed of a good idea needs time to germinate. The choice that emerges organically from deep within is virtually guaranteed to be right for you. Let patience be your friend. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
